core.name: Sakura Aura
core.description:
Leader Bonus:.
Sakura Aura: Team gains 25% DEF in battle. BIO-type characters gain 5% Max HP.

subskills.name: Sakura Aura
subskills.description: Team gains 40% DEF in battle. BIO-type characters gain 9% Max HP.

core.name: Combo: Void Edge
core.description:
Slash flurry attack.
Tap the [ATK] button during Blade Flurry to keep triggering Blade Flurry (limit: 2 times).
Charges toward the enemy: 50% ATK of Physical DMG.
Flurry: 6x30% ATK of Physical DMG.
Fatal Slash: 2x80% + 100% ATK of Physical DMG.
Burst: Charges toward the enemy and deals 40%+30% ATK of Physical DMG.
Flurry: 4x40%+2x30% ATK of Physical DMG.
Fatal Slash:4x70% ATK of Physical DMG.

subskills.name: Blade Shower
subskills.description: Enemies hit by Gotamashi Edge take 15.00% more Physical DMG from Blade Flurry for 3s. Trigger this again to reset the duration.

subskills.name: Gotamashi Edge
subskills.description: Burst: Gotamashi Edge deals another 100.0% ATK of Physical DMG.

subskills.name: QTE: Dancing Flames
subskills.description: Entry: Blade Flurry. QTE: Triggers when an enemy is affected by Time Slow. Restores 1 EM Reserve, deals 3x150%+350% ATK of Physical DMG and knock enemies airborne.

core.name: Passive
core.description:
Character automatically gains passive bonuses.
In both Normal and Burst modes, the 2nd, 3rd, and 5th sequence of Basic ATKs recovers 1, 1, and 2 EM Reserve(s) respectively upon hit.

subskills.name: Shinkage Aura
subskills.description: Attacks against unshielded enemies gain 20% Total DMG Multiplier. Burst: Deal 40% more DMG against shields.

subskills.name: Combo Keeper
subskills.description: Ignores combo interruption once. Can be triggered once every 30.0s. Applies for the whole team.

subskills.name: Current Converter
subskills.description: Gain 0.20% Crit Rate for each Combo Hit Count. Max Crit Rate Bonus: 20.00%.

core.name: Takemikazuchi
core.description:
Enter Burst mode and recover 4 EM Reserves.
Burst: Deals 3x100%+550% ATK of Physical DMG to nearby enemies.
Continuous Burst: Consumes 20 SP to activate and 8 SP/s afterwards. Max duration: 10s.
Burst Basic ATK:
1st Sequence: 60%+40% ATK of Physical DMG.
2nd Sequence: 80%+40% ATK of Physical DMG.
3rd Sequence: 80%+40% ATK of Physical DMG.
4th Sequence: 100%+40% ATK of Physical DMG.
5th Sequence: 150%+3x80% ATK of Physical DMG. Enemies hit are paralyzed for 5s and inflicted with 3 Paralyze Trauma.
At over 100 SP, consumes 20 SP to activate and 8 SP/s afterwards; max duration: 10s.

subskills.name: Martial Stream
subskills.description: Channels energy during Burst. Characters off the field gain 2.00 SP/s.

subskills.name: Ki Spirit
subskills.description: Increases Crit Rate by 10.0% and Crit DMG by 75.0% during Burst.

subskills.name: Avatar of Blades
subskills.description: Burst activation resets Combo Keeper CD and additionally deals DMG equal to Combo Hit Count (max 100) x 5.0% ATK of Physical DMG against nearby enemies. Takes 40% less Total DMG during Burst.

core.name: Raikage
core.description:
Quickly evade enemy attacks. Can be performed twice in a row.
Raikage: Ultimate Evasions trigger a 3s Time Fracture and restores 1 EM Reserve. Duration: 3s; CD: 15s.
When the Valkyrie has any EM Reserve, tap [ATK] during Evasion to consume 1 EM Reserve and throw the Gotamashi Edge toward the enemy, dealing 120% ATK of AOE Physical DMG; restores 2 EM Reserves (in non-Burst mode) and charges toward the enemy, dealing 80% (130%+30% in Burst mode) ATK of Physical DMG and triggering Blade Flurry.

core.name: Gozan Raimei
core.description:
AOE penta-slash.
1st Sequence: 80% ATK of Physical DMG.
2nd Sequence: 100% ATK of Physical DMG.
3rd Sequence: 100% ATK of Physical DMG.
4th Sequence: 120% ATK of Physical DMG.
5th Sequence: 120%+2x75% ATK of AOE Physical DMG. Enemies hit are paralyzed for 5s and inflicted with 3 Paralyze Trauma.

subskills.name: Spirit Aura
subskills.description: Gains higher Ignore Interrupt during Basic ATKs or Combo ATKs. Reduces Physical DMG taken by 30.0%.

subskills.name: Ankage Jutsu
subskills.description: Basic and Combo ATKs gain 30.0% SP Recovery.
